Type Alias# LinearTimeSeriesForecaster.Configuration

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
typealias Configuration = LinearTimeSeriesForecasterConfiguration
```

Available when `Scalar` conforms to `MLShapedArrayScalar` and `BinaryFloatingPoint`.## [See Also](/documentation/CreateMLComponents/LinearTimeSeriesForecaster/Configuration-swift.typealias#see-also)

### [Supporting types](/documentation/CreateMLComponents/LinearTimeSeriesForecaster/Configuration-swift.typealias#Supporting-types)
